response.overview: On July 14th GCW: Now & Forever 2023 is live on FITE+ straight from Melrose Ballroom in Queens, NY. The event features the GCW World Title Match where Blake Christian defends the title against MAO.  One more title will be on line when The East West Express (Jordan Oliver & Nick Wayne) defend their GCW Tag Team titles against The Bookers (Amazing Red & Brian XL).  Also in the lineup  Six Man Tag Team Match  Grim Reefer, Homicide & Matt Tremont vs Jimmy Lloyd & Los Macizos (Ciclope & Miedo Extremo)  Maki Itoh vs Billie Starkz  LuFisto vs Utami Hayashishita  Mike Bailey vs Yoshihiko  Triple Threat Match  Gringo Loco vs Arez vs Komander  Tag Team Match  Matt Cardona & Steph De Lander vs Bussy (Allie Katch & Effy)  George South vs Mance Warner
response.title: GCW Now And Forever
